title: The Tentacle Monster Everyone Wanted
description: Kip discovered at an unfortunate moment that he was a 'betentacled human'. Since then, he's been abandoned by his teenage crush, his parents, and soon his sister. He's the loneliest tentacle monster in the world until his childhood crush walks back into his life... hopefully not to kill him.Download kindle compatible format directly from eviekiels.net. ePub and PDF available directly from goodreads.
author: Evie Kiels
